title: If God Spoke
lyrics:
I remember when you said to me, Oh
There's a [?], There's a [?]
Make a wish any day, You'll be praising my name
Make a wish any day
Oh you pray to me, Won't you write your song and sing along?



I remember when you yelled at me, Oh

Cursed my name and then you stomped your feet, Oh

It will come any day, Just be patient and wait

You are my baby, What I plan for you will be crazy

Few more minutes be patient, Make a wish anyway



Oh, Oh, Oh

There's a way to..



Wait now, I, Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me babe

(Wait, Wait)

Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me babe

Wait now, I, Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me babe

(Wait, Wait)

Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me babe

Wait now, I, Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me babe

(Wait, Wait)

Only wait on me babe, Only wait on me baby
